description:
siduction Linux 2024.1.0 distribution is now available for download featuring the Xfce 4.20, KDE Plasma 6.2, and LXQt 2.1 desktop environments.

The post siduction Linux 2024.1.0 Released with Xfce 4.20, KDE Plasma 6.2, and LXQt 2.1 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: siduction Linux 2024.1.0 Released with Xfce 4.20, KDE Plasma 6.2, and LXQt 2.1

description:
postmarketOS 24.12 mobile distribution is now available for download based on Alpine Linux 3.21 and featuring support for new devices, new features, updated components, and more.

title: postmarketOS 24.12 Released with KDE Plasma Mobile 6.2.4, GNOME Shell 46

description:
Serpent OS Alpha is now available for download powered by Linux kernel 6.12 LTS and featuring GNOME and COSMIC desktop editions. Here's what's new!

title: Serpent OS Enters Alpha with GNOME and COSMIC Spins, Powered by Linux 6.12 LTS
